title: Asus sells the largest microLED monitor ever for a cool $200,000 — but it’s only 4K and a low refresh rate
description: The 135-inch ProArt Cinema PQ07 can maintain a 2,000-nit brightness without being limited like OLEDs.

title: Facebook now lets you create alt accounts for better privacy and organization
description: Facebook's feature will keep your personal and professional lives separate, but you can only create accounts on mobile.

title: The world's most famous magician invests in data storage startup that wants to send 100GB disks to the Moon for future humanoids
description: A Silicon Valley non-profit wants future generations to one day uncover these nickel-based disks and learn all about humanity

title: YouTube reveals powerful new AI tools for content creators – and we’re scared, frankly
description: A new Dream Screen feature that leverages AI to generate video backgrounds is just the start of YouTube’s plans.

title: Windows Copilot might be the biggest change Microsoft has ever made to its long-running OS
description: Deep integration with Windows 11 means the Windows Copilot could change how you do almost everything in Windows 11

title: Despite general investment downturn AI sees surge in spending, survey shows
description: ABBYY State of Intelligent Automation Report shows the growing popularity of AI automation and its benefits for enterprises across the globe.

title: Everything Microsoft announced at its 2023 Surface Event
description: We got three new Surface products at Microsoft's latest event, but the company seems more interested in talking about AI.

title: A mysterious new Chinese malware strain is targeting large firms across the globe
description: Hackers are targeting large corporations with a brand new malware called ValleyRAT.

title: Bose’s new Dolby Atmos soundbar uses AI to try to take down the Sonos Arc
description: The Bose Smart Ultra soundbar sounds like it could be a rival to the Sonos Arc, with one particularly interesting new sound mode – AI Dialogue.

title: Signal is adding quantum-level encryption to help keep customers safe
description: End-to-end encryption will one day be under threat from quantum computing, but Signal is building in protection now.

title: Microsoft mocks Apple at Surface event, claiming Surface Laptop Studio 2 is faster than the MacBook Pro
description: Microsoft calls out Apple at its Surface event – but is it getting too cocky?

title: Baldur's Gate 3 will finally let you change your appearance in patch 3
description: Larian Studios has announced that Baldur's Gate 3 players will be able to change their character's appearance in patch 3.

title: Look out, Nvidia RTX 4070 – AMD’s RX 7800 XT GPU proves surprisingly fast when power usage is dropped
description: For a huge power drop, the performance penalty to pay is relatively slight with AMD’s mid-range graphics card.

title: Watch out Amazon and Roku, Vizio’s new 4K TVs are vying to be the best budget TVs
description: Vizio's new Quantum Pro and Quantum series 4K TVs provide solid budget options for movie fans and gamers alike.

title: Alien Hominid HD is developer The Behemoth’s way of “contributing to preserving games”
description: The Behemoth producer Ian Moreno tells us that game preservation was a “big aspect” of the decision to develop Alien Hominid HD.

title: Acronis gifts consumers boosted AI power for their cyber-protection
description: A new integrated backup and security solution from Acronis gives individuals and home office users the power of AI.

title: Microsoft announces Copilot all-in-one AI assistant coming to Windows 11 on September 26
description: Yusef Mehdi, Microsoft's head of consumer marketing, presented a multi-purpose new AI assistant - Copilot.

title: Final Fantasy 14 has announced a tabletop RPG adaptation and it's been a long time coming
description: Final Fantasy 14 is getting its own tabletop RPG adaptation answering the call of fans who have been making their own for years.

title: Suda51 and Swery unveil first look at its time looping horror game Hotel Barcelona
description: Japanese developers Suda51 and Swery have unveiled the first look at their time looping horror game Hotel Barcelona.

title: FBI and CISA issue warning about dangerous new ransomware strain
description: Snatch ransomware activity has been on the rise in the last 18 months.

title: Need for Speed developers Criterion Games will now be focusing on the Battlefield franchise
description: EA has announced that Need for Speed studio Criterion Games will focus its efforts on the Battlefield franchise.

title: Payday 3 players killed less than 2,000 civilians on the first day of early access, which is surprisingly considerate of them
description: Stats from the first day of Payday 3's early access have been revealed, and the number of civilian NPCs killed is surprisingly small.

title: Microsoft Surface Event 2023 liveblog: all the latest devices from Microsoft's NYC event
description: The Microsoft Surface Event 2023 is here, and we're live on the ground in NYC to bring you all the latest developments and product reveals.

title: The EU's quest to fix the internet could become a privacy and security nightmare
description: Experts warn proposed revisions could lead to greater surveillance, censorship, and false security. We spoke to Mozilla to learn more—here's what they said.

title: Microsoft to lay out its ambitious vision for AI integration in Windows 11 - here's what to expect
description: Microsoft is set to reveal major AI integration plans in a special event, expanding OpenAI partnership and reshaping the future of Windows and Surface.

title: EVERYWHERE has a new trailer and closed alpha testing kicks off “soon”
description: EVERYWHERE has a new trailer showcasing its creation tools, and it's been confirmed that closed alpha testing will begin soon.

title: Consumers are being bombarded with billions of threats every year
description: So far this year, there have been more than 1.5bn cyberattacks against Norton users alone.

title: Amazon scraps charge for merchants not using its delivery service
description: Plans to charge some merchants for not using Amazon Prime logistics have been scrapped weeks before potential investigation.

title: Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name and Like a Dragon: Ishin! are coming to Xbox Game Pass
description: Xbox Game Pass members can expect to see a whole bunch of new titles added to the service soon, including two Like a Dragon games.

title: The original Call of Duty: Warzone is shutting down for good today
description: Call of Duty: Warzone Caldera is being shut down today (September 21).

title: Amazon's Echo Pop Kids will entertain your kids with Disney and Marvel surprises
description: The Echo Pop Kids can answer children's burning question via Alexa AI while the new Fire HD 10 gets a performance boost.

title: Government vs Meta: End-to-end encryption without the encryption?
description: How would end-to-end encryption be monitored for harmful content, and how would it affect you, your business, and the future of social media?

title: If you're still using WinRAR, watch out for this dangerous exploit - and please stop
description: A fake PoC for a WinRAR exploit is making rounds, dropping VenomRAT to over-curious users.

title: The Revolution 5 Pro is Nacon's latest modular PS5 controller - and it'll be available very soon
description: Nacon just announced the Revolution 5 Pro controller for PS5, featuring swappable modules and enhanced analog sticks.

title: LG’s free ad-supported streaming app is getting a revamp next month
description: A new version of LG Channels is rolling out next month in the US, in Europe and in other international markets too.

title: The iPhone 15 has two battery-preserving tricks to prevent iPhone 14-style woes
description: It seems Apple is trying to avoid a repeat of the iPhone 14 battery complaints with some new iPhone 15 features.

title: Report: Apple’s 5G iPhone modems won't arrive until at least the iPhone 18 (yes, really)
description: A new report suggests Apple may have bitten off more than it can chew when it comes to 5G iPhone modems.

title: Disney Plus just removed one of its best friends and family-focused features
description: Disney Plus's GroupWatch option for show sharing has been removed and there's no indication that it's going to come back again.

title: Samsung Galaxy Buds FE leak reveals almost everything about the cheap wireless earbuds
description: A new leak has seemingly revealed everything about the budget-friendly Samsung Galaxy Buds FE wireless earbuds.

title: Popular AI art tool Dall-E gets a big upgrade from ChatGPT creator OpenAI
description: Improvements include more nuanced image-generation capabilities, and better safeguarding and security features.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 Patch 3 date moved to September 22 and "it's a big one"
description: Baldur's Gate 3 Patch 3 has received a short delay and will now be released on September 22.

title: Spot the difference with Facebook's new logo – warning, it’s not easy
description: Facebook gets a makeover with an updated logo – I think…

title: We tried out Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth's chocobos, they're everything we wanted, but director Naoki Hamaguchi confirms that there won't be chocobo breeding
description: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth is bringing back chocobo riding and racing, while also adding new ways to customize our feathered friends.

title: The Samsung Galaxy S24 could be even more powerful than the iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 series reportedly performs better in benchmarks than the iPhone 15 Pro line.

title: Panic over: Windows 10 users won’t be left out in the cold with Wi-Fi 7 after all
description: If you were worried you’d need to upgrade to Windows 11 to enjoy Wi-Fi 7 speeds, well, this isn’t the case.

title: Oracle Cloud reveals big generative AI push for enterprise customers
description: API-based Generative AI service from Oracle Cloud allows enterprises to automate with LLMs and proprietary data.

title: GitHub expands Copilot Chat access to individual users
description: Copilot Chat, part of GitHub’s Copilot X, is available in beta to businesses and now individual developers.

title: Netflix and Disney reportedly step in to help end WGA strike, but writers aren't buying it
description: Multiple outlets claim the writers' strike might be nearing its end, which might mean the arrival of new TV shows and movies.

title: The Callisto Protocol creator Glen Schofield is leaving to 'pursue new opportunities'
description: The Callisto Protocol creator is leaving his studio after falling 3 million short of the sales target.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 players still haven't found a secret 2-hour section, according to Astarion's voice actor
description: Voice actor Neil Newbon has revealed that Baldur's Gate 3 players have yet to discover a hidden two-hour section of the game.

title: A new Horizon Zero Dawn board game will act as a prequel to Forbidden West
description: A new Horizon Zero Dawn board game is on the way and it’ll explore the events leading up to Forbidden West.

title: Tomb Raider developer Crystal Dynamics has laid off 10 employees “due to an internal restructuring”
description: Crystal Dynamics has confirmed that it has parted ways with 10 employees “due to an internal restructuring”.

title: Nvidia DLSS 3.5 comes to Cyberpunk 2077 today - just in time for the big 2.0 update
description: Cyberpunk 2077's Night City is being given the DLSS 3.5 treatment today, just in time for the massive 2.0 update.

title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 swings into a release-ready state and goes gold
description: According to a Tweet from developer Insomniac Games, Marvel's Spider-Man 2 has gone gold and is launch-ready.

title: Vodafone successfully made a phone call to space using a normal smartphone
description: Space call is another step towards better connectivity around the globe, says Vodafone.

title: I heard Alexa speak like a trusted friend and I don't know how to feel
description: Hearing the new Alexa voice in person is making me ponder a "Her" voice assistant future

title: Intel developing its own stacked cache tech to compete with AMD 3D V-Cache
description: Intel is working on its own version of stacked cache pioneered by rival AMD, though it looks to be a couple of generations away at least.
